Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes

  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    jason.asSyntax.BodyLiteral
    use PlanBodyImpl instead.
  • Deprecated Enum Classes
    Enum Class
    Description
    jason.asSyntax.BodyLiteral.BodyType
    Use BodyType of PlanBody instead
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    jason.asSemantics.Agent.initAg(AgArch, BeliefBase, String, Settings)
    Prefer the initAg method with only the source code of the agent as parameter. A call of this method like 
         TransitionSystem ts = ag.initAg(arch, bb, asSrc, stts)
    can be replaced by 
         new TransitionSystem(ag, new Circumstance(), stts, arch);
     ag.setBB(bb); // only if you use a custom BB
     ag.initAg(asSrc);
     TransitionSystem ts = ag.getTS();
    jason.asSemantics.Agent.initAg(String)
    use initAg() and load(src)
    jason.asSemantics.Agent.load(String)
    jason.asSemantics.Agent.loadAgSrc(String)
    jason.asSemantics.TransitionSystem.getUserAgArch()
    use getAgArch
    jason.asSyntax.DefaultTerm.parse(String)
    it is preferable to use ASSyntax.parseTerm
    jason.asSyntax.parser.SimpleCharStream.getColumn()
    jason.asSyntax.parser.SimpleCharStream.getLine()
    jason.asSyntax.Plan.getFile()
    jason.asSyntax.Plan.getTriggerEvent()
    use getTrigger
    jason.asSyntax.Structure.getTermsSize()
    use getArity
    jason.asSyntax.VarTerm.parseVar(String)
    prefer ASSyntax.parseVar(...)
    jason.environment.Environment.informAgsEnvironmentChanged(Collection<String>)
    use version with String... parameter
    jason.environment.grid.Area.distanceMaxBorder(Location)
    renamed to chebyshevDistanceToBorder
    jason.environment.grid.Location.maxBorder(Location)
    renamed to distanceChessboard
    jason.infra.local.BaseLocalMAS.getRuntimeServices()
    use RuntimeServicesFactory.get() instead.
    jason.infra.local.BaseLocalMAS.setRuntimeServices(RuntimeServices)
    use RuntimeServicesFactory.set() instead.
    jason.infra.local.LocalAgArch.getUserAgArch()
    use getFirstAgArch instead
    jason.mas2j.parser.SimpleCharStream.getColumn()
    jason.mas2j.parser.SimpleCharStream.getLine()
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    jason.asSyntax.NumberTermImpl(String)
    prefer to use ASSyntax.parseNumber
